## Let us pour for you

### Why us?

Ohio Bartending Services  
**Ohio Bartending Services** provides **professional certified bartenders and
mixologists** with experience in some of the top restaurants and nightclubs in
Ohio.

Ohio Bartending Services has **One Million Dollar Liquor Liability Insurance
Coverage with Blanket Coverage**.

We provide professional, efficient, upscale, affordable personalized mobile
**bartending services in Ohio**. We provide professional bartenders for hire
and mixologists for weddings, corporate & business events, formal dinner
parties, sporting events, private home parties and much more.  

**Request a Quote today so that we can mix up a detailed quote and sling up
some tasty cocktails for your next special event!**

REQUEST A QUOTE

### Professional Bartenders For Hire

Ohio Bartending Services  
We take pride in our unmatched and exceptional attention to detail, quality
and customer service. The traveling bartender or bartenders for your event
will arrive approximately one hour before they are to start serving your
guests to bring in bartending equipment, supplies, mixers/juices, bags of ice,
etc. ( **Please see our PDF** ). The bartender(s) will then put the beer,
wine, etc. on ice and/or in the coolers to ensure that the alcohol has had the
proper amount of cooling time needed. They will then setup and organize the
bar area to be able to provide the **most efficient and fastest service**
while providing **fantastic cocktails, customer service and attention to
detail for your guests**. When you book with us, you are getting an
**authentic bartender with a passion for the art and craft of bartending.**

Whatever your event may be, we are here to provide the best service to you and
your guests to **make your gathering elegant and unforgettable.**

more

### What`s new

Great Drink Recipes for Your event!  
Visit our **blog page or Facebook page** to find the perfect drinks for your
event!

The **cocktails listed on ourFacebook page** or **Instagram Page** are just a
few of the many drinks that we can make for your event by booking us today.
The Bartender for hire, Wedding Bartender or Event Bartender can make any
signature cocktail(s) that you decide on.
